mapper.select: select sign.id, sign.competition_id, sign.student_id student_id, sign.captain_id, sign.team_name, sign.option_item, sign.verify, sign.active, sign.create_time, sign.update_time, i1.name verify_name, comp.type comp_type, comp.name comp_name, stu.name student_name, cap.name captain_name, i2.name type_name from sign left join constant_type t1 on t1.code = 'AUDITSTATUS' left join constant_item i1 on i1.type_id = t1.id and i1.code = sign.verify left join competition comp on comp.id = sign.competition_id left join constant_type t2 on t2.code = 'COMPETITIONTYPE' left join constant_item i2 on i2.type_id = t2.id and i2.code = comp.type left join student cap on cap.id = sign.captain_id left join student stu on concat(',', sign.student_id, ',') like concat('%,', stu.num_id, ',%') ${ew.customSqlSegment}
